channel.title: [Poll] Rsps Is Boring?
channel.description: Well, everytime I go on a RSPS it bores the hell out of me, and recently programming them or even thinking about them bores me. How do you people feel?

item.title: [Poll] Rsps Is Boring?
item.dc:creator: @laurent_248 laurent 248
item.description:
@laurent_248 wrote:

Coding is pretty nice sometimes and can makes you earn some money but playing is boring to me.

Read full topic

item.title: [Poll] Rsps Is Boring?
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

The only reason I don’t have a degree in programming yet is because I’m not old enough yet (imo)

Read full topic

item.title: [Poll] Rsps Is Boring?
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:24, topic:386330”]RuneScape Private Servers have become boring to be because most of the time when I end up getting on a server, it’s either a leech or the staff is horrible. It’s starting to become hard to think of new things, as we are kind of limited to what we can do with RuneScape Private Servers.

Therefore, I’m active on the forums the most and and don’t get on the game almost at all.[/quote]
If you have time pm me, I’ll show you a great server made a a member of this community that isn’t leeched, and reminds me of the old times; it’s just more pking based. I play this server whenever I’m done working on Rune Rebirth for the day.

[quote=“Wintercanon, post:20, topic:386330”][quote author=Clawz fury link=topic=482082.msg3530636#msg3530636 date=1300139775]
Idea; I sware all the RSPS Programming Gods (Graham, Blake etc.) should go together and make a private server, but not just a Framework, they should fully complete it and publicly host it.
That would be amazing.
[/quote]Haha the Runescape private server programming gods? They aren’t gods, just good at programming because they’re smart and took computer science or a similar degree at college. They only looks like gods in comparison to the rest of this community.

I don’t even like Runescape. I don’t think I could stand playing a private server either. But I enjoy writing private servers because they are a good introduction to game design and networking.[/quote]
They are Gods in my eyes :o

Read full topic

item.title: [Poll] Rsps Is Boring?
item.dc:creator: @r0ckstar96 r0ckstar96
item.description:
@r0ckstar96 wrote:

I got bored playing RSPS so I quit playing them. After many failed attempts at making a good server, I stopped with that too.
Now I do other things on the internet that could benefit me more down the road.

Read full topic

item.title: [Poll] Rsps Is Boring?
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:24, topic:386330”]RuneScape Private Servers have become boring to be because most of the time when I end up getting on a server, it’s either a leech or the staff is horrible. It’s starting to become hard to think of new things, as we are kind of limited to what we can do with RuneScape Private Servers.

Therefore, I’m active on the forums the most and and don’t get on the game almost at all.[/quote]
True!

I find programming a server to be highly unboring. Thinking up new creative features and learning new things every day? My idea of fun if you ask me. However, it is true most private servers now are all about the same thing… dupe shit, get dclaws, win.

Read full topic

item.title: [Poll] Rsps Is Boring?
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

RuneScape Private Servers have become boring to be because most of the time when I end up getting on a server, it’s either a leech or the staff is horrible. It’s starting to become hard to think of new things, as we are kind of limited to what we can do with RuneScape Private Servers.

Therefore, I’m active on the forums the most and and don’t get on the game almost at all.

Read full topic

Idea; I sware all the RSPS Programming Gods (Graham, Blake etc.) should go together and make a private server, but not just a Framework, they should fully complete it and publicly host it.
That would be amazing.
[/quote]Haha the Runescape private server programming gods? They aren’t gods, just good at programming because they’re smart and took computer science or a similar degree at college. They only looks like gods in comparison to the rest of this community.

item.title: [Poll] Rsps Is Boring?
item.dc:creator: @Wintercanon Wintercanon
item.description:
@Wintercanon wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:2, topic:386330”]Idea; I sware all the RSPS Programming Gods (Graham, Blake etc.) should go together and make a private server, but not just a Framework, they should fully complete it and publicly host it.
That would be amazing.[/quote]Haha the Runescape private server programming gods? They aren’t gods, just good at programming because they’re smart and took computer science or a similar degree at college. They only looks like gods in comparison to the rest of this community.

I don’t even like Runescape. I don’t think I could stand playing a private server either. But I enjoy writing private servers because they are a good introduction to game design and networking.

item.title: [Poll] Rsps Is Boring?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Programming and creating custom features that no one else has thought of before is fun. Playing servers is only fun when it’s that way as well.

Read full topic

item.title: [Poll] Rsps Is Boring?
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

[quote=“ranger squad, post:14, topic:386330”]David, last time I checked it isn’t that hard to submit two integers and a string to a vector, and then search through the vector for one of the integers and add the money (second integer) to the other user (the string would be his name).

And I am posting on what you post as you are a moron who frequently posts incorrect things that I feel the need to correct. That, and the fact that you’ve been a prick to me multiple times in the past.[/quote]
You don’t know what you’re talking about either. On the topic of the GE, I’m pretty sure there is some client side workings to it, which would require you to have some knowledge of the protocol.

Read full topic

item.title: [Poll] Rsps Is Boring?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“ranger squad, post:14, topic:386330”]David, last time I checked it isn’t that hard to submit two integers and a string to a vector, and then search through the vector for one of the integers and add the money (second integer) to the other user (the string would be his name).[/quote]What on earth are you talking about…

You miss my point; you hardly see any advanced feature development because people don’t know how. If you care to argue that, post some examples of people that don’t know much about how the protocol works that have made advanced features.

Read full topic

item.title: [Poll] Rsps Is Boring?
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

David, last time I checked it isn’t that hard to submit two integers and a string to a vector, and then search through the vector for one of the integers and add the money (second integer) to the other user (the string would be his name).

And I am posting on what you post as you are a moron who frequently posts incorrect things that I feel the need to correct. That, and the fact that you’ve been a prick to me multiple times in the past.

Read full topic

item.title: [Poll] Rsps Is Boring?
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

ranger squad:

Davidi, creating a grand exchange system is nothing to do with the protocol. It isn’t that hard to convert a “317” to “508” without changing much of the server itself.

You’re retarded.

Read full topic

item.title: [Poll] Rsps Is Boring?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“ranger squad, post:11, topic:386330”]Davidi, creating a grand exchange system is nothing to do with the protocol. It isn’t that hard to convert a “317” to “508” without changing much of the server itself.[/quote]Why are you just going to every topic I post in and going against me; sounds like you are trying to start a flame war? But it is related to the protocol, it’s about sending items on interfaces, sending configs etc. I guess you could say it’s more about frame methods, but that’s all part of it as well, and is still stuff most people don’t understand. Which was my point

Read full topic

This ^
